## InternalStringToNumber type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type InternalStringToNumber<
  S extends string,
  T extends readonly unknown[] = [],
> = S extends `${number}`
  ? S extends `${T['length']}`
    ? T['length']
    : InternalStringToNumber<S, [...T, '']>
  : never
```
